description: Erection of a single storey side extension and front porch
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: [Fire strategy statement
Received: 21/12/2023
12/Craigwell Ave/101 REV C, 12/Craigwell Ave/102 REV C, 12/Craigwell Ave/103 REV C, 12/Craigwell Ave/104 REV C, 12/Craigwell Ave/105 REV C
Received: 21/02/2024].

Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building, unless otherwise shown on the approved plans.

Condition : 4 - The ground floor bathroom formed in the front elevation as shown on drawing number 12/Craigwell Ave/104 REV C, Received: 21/02/2024, of the hereby approved development shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.

Condition : 5 - The extension hereby permitted shall only be used for a purpose ancillary to the enjoyment of the house at the '12 CRAIGWELL AVENUE TW13 7JP' described at the top of this decision letter and shall not be occupied as a separate dwelling other than as described in the submitted application, nor used for business purposes and shall not have a separate external entrance
